comments: Students of OPIM101 with Clemons and  Hitt found few problems with either of the professors, saying that they were both approachable and very eager to answer students’ questions. Some even went as far as to say “my favorite teachers ever”. However, students were a little divided over the tendency to digress from the course material and the somewhat “irrelevant” examples used to explain concepts. Some students were delighted by the “cool stories” the professors told, while others found it rather distracting. Students either passionately approved or disapproved of the removal of VBA from the course material.
